mapper.select: SELECT tb_chat_partner.id AS partner_id , tb_chat_partner.name AS name , tb_chat_partner.hobby AS hobby , tb_chat_partner.personality AS personality , tb_chat_partner.job AS job , tb_chat_partner.language AS language , tb_chat_partner.reg_date AS reg_date , tb_file.id AS file_id , tb_file_dtl.id AS file_dtl_id , tb_file_dtl.original_name AS file_original_name , tb_file_dtl.mimetype AS file_mime_type , tb_file_dtl.file_name AS file_name , tb_file_dtl.path AS file_path , tb_file_dtl.size AS file_size FROM tb_chat_partner LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file ON tb_chat_partner.profile_file_id = tb_file.id AND tb_file.del_yn = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file_dtl ON tb_file.id = tb_file_dtl.parent_id WHERE target_user_key = #{targetUserKey}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM tb_chat WHERE tb_chat.id = #{chatId} AND tb_chat.del_yn = 'N'

WITH insert_chat_data AS ( INSERT INTO tb_chat(chat_partner_id, reg_id) VALUES (#{chatPartnerId}, #{regId}) RETURNING * ) SELECT insert_chat_data.id AS chat_id , insert_chat_data.chat_partner_id AS chat_partner_id , insert_chat_data.reg_id AS reg_id , insert_chat_data.reg_dt AS chat_reg_dt , tb_chat_partner.name AS name , tb_chat_partner.hobby AS hobby , tb_chat_partner.personality AS personality , tb_chat_partner.profile_file_id AS profile_file_id , tb_chat_partner.job AS job , tb_chat_partner.language AS language FROM insert_chat_data , tb_chat_partner WHERE insert_chat_data.chat_partner_id = tb_chat_partner.id AND tb_chat_partner.del_yn = 'N'
